content.rendered:
Uttarakhand consists of a diverse range of topographical features that not only captures the imagination of the dreamers but it also helps in allowing you to have an adrenaline-pumping adventure on the hills. From climbing up the hills to walking through the green forest cover and sleeping under the glimmering stars while camping on the Bugyals are just a few options you can explore here. The region is blessed with a varied landscape that ranges from jagged mountain peaks, icy hills and glaciers to gorges, valleys and flat lands as well making it perfect for indulging in a range of fun activities for everyone and every age. No matter what your grade of expertise is, this land of promises welcomes you with open arms and warm smiles which will make you keep coming back for more. Traveling to Uttarakhand has become synonymous with traveling for one of the most thrilling adventure activities. If you are not the religious type and are looking for some action-packed adventure to indulge in then these are a few activities this place has to offer:

01. Trekking

It doesn’t matter if you are an avid traveler or a hardcore trekker then Uttarakhand is one of the best places to indulge in this amazing activity which has gathered travelers and trekking enthusiasts from all over the world. Become footloose in the Himalayas and choose one of the several options for trekking like Gaumukh Tapovan Trek, Dayara Bugyal Trek, Har Ki Dun Trek among several others. Be sure to be well equipped while traveling on these pathways which will definitely be one of the most awe-inspiring experiences of your life.

02. Camping

Although the government of India has some really strict rules regarding responsible camping activities in Uttarakhand still if you follow these regulations then this will be one of the most refreshingly adventurous experiences you will ever have. Sleeping under the light of the million stars, amidst the scenic beauty of oak and pine forests and the lush greenery of the Bugyals every step of the way you cover for camping makes the effort totally worth it. Some of the camping options in Uttarakhand include places like – Shivpuri (near Rishikesh), Auli, Nainital, Bhimtal, Chopta, Dodital, Dhanaulti, etc. all the options depend on your preference and gradient of difficulty you can handle.

03. Bungee Jumping

People visiting Uttarakhand has 1 particular activity which is well availed by people who visit for adventure fun. Bungee jumping is one of the most adrenaline-pumping activities to indulge in. jumping from a height on top of a river and amidst the scenic beauty of the lush green hills surrounding it, this adventure activity will definitely be one of the most amazing experiences in your life. This sport takes place primarily around the Rishikesh region next to the holy river of Ganga in Shivpuri and one of the best options for this is the jumping heights who are reliable professionals making your experience all the more thrilling.

04. White River Rafting

This water adventure sports activity has quickly gained a lot of attention of people looking to get away from the boring daily routine. Cutting through the river and braving through the rapids and waves and going through the overlooking hills is something that you will cherish forever in your life. The Ganga River gushing downhill creates one of the best options to ride these waves and some of the most popular as well as offbeat places for this particular activity are Rishikesh, Haridwar, tons river rafting near sari village and many more.

05. Jungle Safari

The entire hill state of Uttarakhand is covered in some of the most amazing and world-class national parks and sanctuaries which are home to a range of hilly flora fauna and avian creatures. It is a real treat for people looking for an adventure amongst their natural habitat. The jeep safari of Corbett is one of the most highly availed activities in Uttarakhand which is also perfect for family getaways. There are several lesser-explored national parks near Haridwar and Rishikesh where you can even go on adventurous elephant rides as well.

06. Skiing

Did you know that Uttarakhand has become one of the most amazing destinations for indulging in fun and thrilling adventure activity? People primarily visit Auli here since it gets completely covered in snow but can be accessed via an equally adventurous and adrenaline-pumping ropeway ride. This place has also hosted national skiing competition which had been participated by competitors from all over the world. Cutting through the glistening white snow in full speed and feeling the cold winter air through your hair and face will be one of the most mesmerizing things that happen to you.

07. Paragliding

Currently famed for being one of the most trending adventure sports activities to take place on the hills paragliding should definitely be on your bucket list of adventure. Gliding over the lush green scenic snow-clad hills amongst the mist will be etched in your heart forever. Gracefully flying through the cold air and feeling the adrenaline pump in your veins as you savor some of the most breath taking views of the surrounding and the valleys below will remain in your memories forever. This activity takes place in a lot of locations that can be included in your Uttarakhand weekend getaway tour packages like Bhimtal, Nainital, Mussoorie, Pithoragarh, Bedni Bugyal, etc.

07. Canoeing and Kayaking

This F1 of water paddling activity and challenging the rapids here is one of the most sought after adventure water sports activities in Uttarakhand. Navigating through the Ganga River is considered to be one of the most adventurous things you can do in a lifetime since this river is known for its unpredictable nature so it is truly an adventure in every sense. This can be experienced by everyone including beginners and experts. This if a fun-packed activity which must be experienced at least once in a lifetime.

Suggested Tours

  • Uttarakhand Tour Packages
  • Wonders of Kumaon Tour
  • Uttarakhand Bird Watching Tour
  • Valley of Flowers Trek Tour
  • Uttarakhand Delights Tour
  • Majestic Kumaon Tour
  • Hills of Kumaon Tour
  • Uttarakhand Heritage Tour
